https://tmrev.io/movie/345957-Butterflies of Bill Baker 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Bill Baker, a kind, sensitive and content man, enjoys life's simple pleasures, such as tilling his garden or playing with butterflies. His seemingly fulfilling life is disrupted by Pavornocturnus - a night terror disorder that causes Bill to commit violent acts while asleep. His disorder can only be relieved with a unique, dangerous, and mind-altering technology. Butterflies of Bill Baker
